I am using mod_fcgid 2.3.6, and I wanted to setup two kind of fcgid apps based on the documentroot, with this config:

<Directory /web/apps1>
  AddHandler fcgid-script .app
  FcgidWrapper "/usr/local/app1/wrapper.sh" .app
</Directory>
<Directory /web/apps2>
  AddHandler fcgid-script .app
  FcgidWrapper "/usr/local/app2/wrapper.sh" .app
</Directory>

But when starting Apache I get:
FcgidWrapper not allowed here

I dont understand, if its is possible to bind a specific wrapper to a <Location> block, why is it not possible to bind it to a <Directory> ?

Please add this feature to the module, it would help a lot.
